text: Kilekoile ami bhoi lage, hobole pare, jitia ami ahibo, apuni khan ke eneka napabo jineka ami bhabi ase, aru amike apnikhan pora jineka bhabona kora nai eneka pabo pare, hobole pare ta te jhagara khan, suku-jula, khong kora, mara-mari, chukuli, bodnam kora, phutani kora, gondugol khan hobo bhi pare.
